changeSet.author: platform
platform
changeSet.comment: Add ROLE_ prefix to known data roles if missing

changeSet.author: platform
changeSet.comment: Align INST_* roles to DEPT_* when dataset.scope=DEPT
changeSet.sql: UPDATE catalog_access_policy p SET allow_roles = replace(replace(replace(p.allow_roles, 'ROLE_INST_DATA_VIEWER','ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER'), 'ROLE_INST_DATA_DEV','ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV'), 'ROLE_INST_DATA_OWNER','ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER') FROM catalog_dataset d WHERE p.dataset_id = d.id AND UPPER(COALESCE(d.scope,'')) = 'DEPT' AND p.allow_roles ~ 'ROLE_INST_DATA_(VIEWER|DEV|OWNER)';

changeSet.author: platform
changeSet.comment: Align DEPT_* roles to INST_* when dataset.scope=INST
changeSet.sql: UPDATE catalog_access_policy p SET allow_roles = replace(replace(replace(p.allow_roles, 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER','ROLE_INST_DATA_VIEWER'), 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV','ROLE_INST_DATA_DEV'), 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER','ROLE_INST_DATA_OWNER') FROM catalog_dataset d WHERE p.dataset_id = d.id AND UPPER(COALESCE(d.scope,'')) = 'INST' AND p.allow_roles ~ 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_(VIEWER|DEV|OWNER)';
